General.Name: Medallion Bank PR
General.Description: Medallion Bank, an industrial bank, originates consumer loans, raises deposits, and conducts other banking activities in the United States. The company operates through three segments: Recreation Lending, Home Improvement Lending, and Other. It provides consumer loans to purchase recreational vehicles, boats, and trailers. The company also offers financing for windows, siding, and roof replacement; and swimming pool and other home improvement projects, as well as provides loan origination services. It offers its products through the network of dealers, contractors, and financial service providers. The company was incorporated in 2002 and is headquartered in Salt Lake City, Utah. Medallion Bank operates as a subsidiary of Medallion Financial Corp.
General.Address: 1100 East 6600 South, Salt Lake City, UT, United States, 84121
